name: Olive Board 29
description:
This is a unique piece that was cut from the edge of a trunk of a tree that grew in Phoenix, Arizona. It has a nice grain structure on the inside, but you also see the natural shape of the wood on the outside. It would make a perfect cheeseboard, bread  plate, serving plate or even a light-duty cutting board. Cracks have been filled with a mix of coffee grounds and epoxy which is food safe and also gives a nice contrast to the board's natural grain. It was finished by soaking in a bath of mineral oil, and comes with a jar of handmade board cream. 

Measures approx 8" x 8.75" x 1.25"

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Olive Board 30
description:
This lovely board consists of two book-matched end grain pieces from a tree harvested in Phoenix, Arizona. Its cracks have been filled with food safe a mixture of coffee grounds and epoxy, and was finished by soaking in a mineral oil bath. It would make a lovely cheeseboard, serving board, or even a light duty cutting board. It includes a jar of handmade board cream. The tightness of the grain makes the board feel incredibly soft and gives a great texture.

Measures approx 8" wide x 9.5" long x 1" tall

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Olive Board 46
description:
This is a long-grain board that would make a perfect cheeseboard, bread  plate, serving plate or even a light-duty cutting board. It is made from a tree that grew in Phoenix, Arizona. Cracks have been filled with a pigmented epoxy which is food safe and also gives a nice contrast to the board's natural grain. It was finished by soaking in a bath of mineral oil, and comes with a jar of handmade board cream. 

Measures approx 9.75" x 17" x 1"

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Build Your Own Board
description:
The BYOB Kit! This makes a perfect gift for somebody who is a little handy, or for somebody who wants to see what they can do.

It includes a single board that has been planed and sanded to 120 grit and finally branded with the Arizona Olive Wood logo, a jar of handmade board cream to finish the board, and a set of instructions for how to complete the project. You can finish it with only just a little sandpaper if you'd like to keep it simple. 

Each board is unique, and I'll make sure you get a board that lives up to quality I expect in all the boards I produce. 

Boards are about 16" long x 4"-5" wide x 1" high.

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Olive Board 28
description:
This board is a round log section cut from a tree in Phoenix, Arizona, and makes an great cheeseboard, presentation piece, or even a small cutting board. Its cracks have been filled with a food safe mixture of ground coffee and epoxy. It was treated by soaking in mineral oil for a week, and includes a jar of handmade board cream.

Measures approx 7" diameter x 1.5"

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Walnut Block 55
description:
Aside from olive wood, I like live-edge walnut slabs. This block was made from an Arizona-grown walnut tree.

It would make an excellent presentation piece, or even a small cutting board for a picnic basket. You can cut on the end grain and then serve on the long grain.

Measures approx 4" x 11.5" x 5.75"

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."

name: Handmade Board Cream
description:
This is the perfect preservative and moisturizer for your wooden cookware or furniture (and even makes a nice hand cream). It is a mixture of beeswax and mineral oil that I make in my own kitchen. It comes in a 2.7 ounce jar, but because of density, when the jar is filled you get a little more than 2 ounces. 

Just wipe some on your board, let it soak in, and then wipe off the excess. 

A jar is included with every board sold.

If you are local to Phoenix and would like to pick the board up (for free) instead of paying for shipping, enter discount code "LOCAL."
